FullCodeApps

This is a repository of apps from FullCodes (and indiviual members)

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThatFinnDev/fullcodesfdroid/master/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
D5 BF 94 98 AE B3 22 FE E6 9C 04 2C B4 64 5D 74 10 2D 53 47 3E E3 AC E3 94 ED 5B BD 19 AC 31 6E
